subject: Federal Ministry of Finance
body:
Federal Ministry of Finance (FMF) 
Ahmadu Bello Way, Central Business District 
Abuja, Nigeria PMB 14, Abuja, Nigeria 
Abuja FCT 00234 Nigeria
16th, March 2023
 
 
Attn: 
 
This is to inform you that we are now processing your transfer payment  as approved for remittance into your account by the Senate Committee on Foreign Debt Settlement  . On this therefore, you are requested to kindly reconfirm your receiving details and current address with your direct mobile number for easy reach .
Right now, all your payment documents need to be re-validated to enable the telex unit to remit to your account and  you are required  to come and sign your payment release order at our CBN telex Credit department in person  to enable final transfer to you as approved . 
 
If you can not make it down here in person due time constraints, I will get  an attorney appointed to act on your behalf and represent you in all legal requirements and sign all the necessary transfer payment documents , while you pay his legal fee . 
This is all that we need now to complete your payment  release 
      Thank you 
      Mrs, Zainab Ahmed 
      Finance Minister

subject: Re:   Federal Ministry of Finance
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for your message. I am glad to hear that the transfer payment is being processed. However, I am currently unable to travel due to personal reasons. 

Could you please provide more information about appointing an attorney on my behalf? What would be the cost of their legal fee and how can it be paid?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Cameron

subject: Re: Federal Ministry of Finance
body:
Federal Ministry of Finance (FMF)
Ahmadu Bello Way, Central Business District
Abuja, Nigeria PMB 14, Abuja, Nigeria
Abuja FCT 00234 Nigeria
Date : 7th Feb,  2024


Dear,  Mr Cameron

Your email has been received and noted and  I wish to also inform you that
you can receive this payment in an ATM Card and since you can not fly down
here in person to do the required validation of your payment documents  , I
will get you an attorney from the legal department to represent you in
processing the re-validation and legalization of all your payment documents
so you can be issued with the following clearance certificates before the
release of your payment  :

1. Fund Origin Certificate of Ownership
2, Payment Certificate of Legality
3. Money Laundry and Drug/Anti-terrorist clearance Cert .
4. Non-Resident Payment Permit

These above documents are the documents the lawyer will be processing for
validation upon your response and thereafter I will issue your ATM Card
with a custom based PIN for your daily withdrawals or better still you
receive direct transfer into your account . This validation/legalization
will cost you $750 only which is the legal processing fee of the attorney

On this note therefore it is important you arrange the  legal fee between
now and tomorrow and get back to me for the payment details, you have to
send this fee by bank transfer or by MoneyGram as the case may be to aid
the re-validation of your payment documents as required  .

I have been in touch with your representing attorney and he will be in my
office tomorrow morning to take your details for processing so kindly
reconfirm your details and also your receiving account and then get this
ready and get back to me for instructions on how to send it to the attorney
to enable the processing so we can remit to you accordingly  .

       Thank you
       Dr Wale Edun
      Finance Minister
